name: Cat vs Rat
description:
Cat vs Rat is turn-based game where you are a cat and need to kill the rat who invaded your kitchen. 

This is our first game ever and we used only Scratch to make it. Also, this is our submission to 4 Hour Jam 2021 where we need to make game in very limited time.

CONTROLS:

Movement : Arrow Keys

You need to move towards the rat to attack.

CREATED BY:

Ayberk Karakas https://www.instagram.com/ayberkkarakas_art

Berfin Ceylan https://www.instagram.com/berfinnceyllan
